desc: We're bringing you the finest apparel, most current wardrobe expertise, and exceptional service in a friendly and unpretentious atmosphere; straight to your phone, tablet, and computer.

layout.text: Our online store is temporarily closed.

To better serve our clients we are currently updating our inventory and online shopping experience.
Please visit us in-store or give us a call today.
(803) 648-2100
Hours: 9am - 6pm 
132 Laurens St SW, Aiken, SC 29801 

Join our email list at the bottom of this page for more updates!
